    • changePage

      Parameters:

      format - - Format the page.
      Returns:

    • copyToClipboard

      public static net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.ClickEvent copyToClipboard(String copy, @Nullable Object... format)
      Generates a copy to clipboard click event. COPY_TO_CLIPBOARD will copy text to the player's clipboard.

      This directly copies the text to player's clipboard without any notification, so SUGGEST_COMMAND could be more useful as it provides visual feedback.

      Parameters:
      copy - - Text to copy.
      format - - Format the text.
      Returns:
      COPY_TO_CLIPBOARD ClickEvent.
